document.full_text: jorge posada hit a tying home run in the ninth inning, but phil hughes struggled for the third straight start, raising questions about how effective he can be for the yankees.
document.title: yankees 6, orioles 5: rally can't calm unease over hughes
lines_and_colors: jorge posada hit a tying home run in the ninth inning, but phil hughes struggled for the third straight start, raising questions about how effective he can be for the yankees.
